tooltip.skillcloaks.attack_cloak: §7Your armor has a chance to not lose durability§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.cooking_cloak: §7Using the ability while holding a flint and steel cooks any food in your other hand§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.crafting_cloak: §7Using the ability opens a crafting window for you§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.defence_cloak: §7Prevents your death, has a cooldown of one Minecraft day§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.farming_cloak: §7Your Bone Meal affects a larger area§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.firemaking_cloak: §7Using the ability gives you a torch§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.fishing_cloak: §7Killing an enemy brings their loot and xp to you§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.fletching_cloak: §7Loading an arrow into a crossbow has a chance to give you a copy of the arrow§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.herblore_cloak: §7You can make potions with your hands§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.magic_cloak: §7The damage you deal is converted into Magic damage§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.prayer_cloak: §7You don't lose any experience or your cloak on death§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.ranging_cloak: §7Shooting an arrow with a bow has a chance to return the arrow§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.runecraft_cloak: §7Your tools have a chance to not lose durability§o
tooltip.skillcloaks.smithing_cloak: §7Using the ability while holding a flint and steel smelts any ore in your other hand§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.thieving_cloak: §7You can crouch to hide from enemies§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.woodcutting_cloak: §7Breaking tree leaves has a chance to drop extra loot from bird nests§r
tooltip.skillcloaks.max_cloak: §7Has the effects of all the other cloaks. Use the ability key while holding this to change mode§r
